reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this B&B purely on the basis of Trip Advisor and we can confirm the other positive reviews of this hotel. Bear in mind that this is a fairly simple B&B that is spotlessly clean and with a delightful atmosphere. It is not a deluxe 5 star hotel.
reviews.title: Simple but charming and wonderful host

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is excellent just half a block back from the seafront and its accompanying bars, restaurants and private beach facilities. The hotel has no parking but Anna will assist in helping you find nearby street parking and setting you up with a parking permit.
reviews.title: Refreshing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is decorated in a very light and minimalist manner, white, light and airy. There is a lovely sitting area in the lobby with plenty of information on the local area as well as a small dining room where an ample choice of breakfast items are available. Our room was very simple but it was huge and as a result it was delightfully cool and airy.
reviews.title: Great owner who gives a fantastic B+B the personal touch!

reviews.text: The real selling point of this hotel is Anna and her family who made us feel truly at home and who has a real enthusiasm for her town and this area of Tuscany. I would certainly stay here again.
reviews.title: Excellent owner, thoughtful planning, central location

reviews.text: I booked this from TA. The location was fine about 10 mins & 10-15Euro from train station. Anna was a perfect host. She cooked us spaghetti vongole as TA comments suggested we try it. We were not disappointed. The room was clean, light and bright. We had a triple room for 2 and appreciated a little space. There is no lift, but Anna was willing to help with luggage up the stairs. We loved our stay of 2 nights. We visited Lucca & Pisa from here. Maybe we should have had an extra day to appreciate Viareggio a bit better.
reviews.title: A gorgeous B&B in an excellent location

reviews.text: Fantastic find via trip advisor, this place is a bargain in an otherwise pricey resort. Clean and airy, big beautifully decorated rooms with very nice bathroom and shower (powerful too). Breakfast is excellent and included homemade delicacies. Great location being opposite the beach and good parking, although we went slightly out of season and I know parking can be tricky in the high season.
reviews.title: Superb B&B

reviews.text: Anna marie was a lovely welcoming Landlady, and I'll come back here again with family and recommend to freinds.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: This place is the classic italian experience! With an amazing location near the beach, extremely comfy and clean rooms, and a home-made breakfast to die for .... there is no better reason to stay here than to know the woman who runs this place. Even though she handles the whole place alone, she goes out of her way and beyond all expectations to make you feel at home and welcome. She made my experience in Viareggio SO fun and feel-good ... it was heart-warming to meet and stay with someone like her! Actually a blessed experience. When I return to Italy, I wont stay anywhere else!!
reviews.title: Would love to keep this place a secret!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 5 nights in August 2012 with our 2 daughters. The hotel is small and beautiful and Anna the owner is a wonderful hostess. Our bedroom was light and airy and decorated beautifully. There were bunks for the kids and a mini-fridge, which was very important in the heat! There was also air-con which did not switch off when you left the room so we came back to a lovely cool room after a long hot day on the beach. Anna provided a lovely breakfast which always included wonderful bread, home made cake and fresh fruit. She also cooks in the evening if you book ahead and it is well worth it! I had the best spaghetti vongole I have ever had! The wine was included in the fixed price and was excellent and I will definitely ask her to cook again on our next visit! We LOVED this hotel and though we would love to keep it a secret so there is space for us when we want to go back, but it is really wonderful. It is close to the beach and Anna will book a beach brolly for you if you ask. It is also close to town so you can have a lovely passeggiata in the evening and watch the sunset.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel and host

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Grazie Anna per una fantastica vacanza e torniamo presto!
reviews.title: Fantastic Host
